Title: Luck at First Sight
Writer: Bela Padilla (story), Neil Arce (story), Ays de Guzman (screenplay)
Actors: Jericho Rosales, Bela Padilla, Jeric Raval, Dennis Padilla
Plot: Joma Labayen (Jericho Rosales) believes that a "life charm" would help him win money to pay for his debts. He accidentally meets Diane Dela Cruz (Bela Padilla), who gives him luck only when...
